entry.title: dotnet/announcements - Issues & Pull Requests - 2022-02-14
entry.content:
Issues

Closed

  • To build source-build 6.0.102, use dotnet/installer's v6.0.102-source-build tag #209

entry.title: dotnet/runtime - Issues & Pull Requests - 2022-02-14
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • [Apple ARM64] dotnet crashing when debugging in .NET 7 (7.0.100-preview.2.22101.4) #65341
  • [wasm] runtime crashes in `System.Threading.Channels.Tests` #65337
  • [wasm] Runtime crashes in `System.Text.Json` #65336
    7.0.0
  • [wasm] interpreter crash `memory access out of bounds` in `System.Collections.Immutable.Tests` #65335
    7.0.0
  • Assertion failed 'block->KindIs(BBJ_NONE, BBJ_ALWAYS)' #65332
    7.0.0
  • JIT doesn't eliminate redundant branch in guarded span.Slice #65327
    7.0.0
  • [Wasm][AOT][net7] [00:00:14.8201271] `* Assertion at mini-llvm.c:13272, condition *nullable_count > 0 not met` #65325
    7.0.0
  • TypeSystem: Support Virtual Static Methods, not just abstract static methods #65324
  • System.Text.Json should support unloadable assemblies correctly #65323
    7.0.0
  • System.Diagnostics.Stopwatch fails to report correct elapsed time #65321
  • [Mono] Clean up the type checks for `Vector64/128` #65318
    7.0.0
  • Unpin C# compiler version for repo #65317
    7.0.0
  • Assertion failed '(emitThisGCrefRegs & regMask) == 0' during 'Emit code' (IL size 129) #65311
  • Assertion failed '!"Write to unaliased local overlaps outstanding read"' during 'Lowering nodeinfo' (IL size 7) #65307
    7.0.0
  • HttpConnectionPool is throwing exception instead of returning HttpResponseMessage #65305
  • JsonSerializerContext.GetTypeInfo depends on hidden value #65306
  • [x86] SequenceEqual returns false for equal spans #65292
  • Test failure System.Text.Json.SourceGeneration.Tests.ConstructorTests_Default.MultipleThreadsLooping #65291
  • Test failure System.Text.RegularExpressions.Tests.RegexMatchTests.Match_VaryingLengthStrings_Huge #65289
  • Test failure JIT/Methodical/MDArray/basics/stringarr_cs_ro/stringarr_cs_ro.sh #65282
  • Test failure JIT\\HardwareIntrinsics\\Arm\\AdvSimd.Arm64\\AdvSimd.Arm64_Part2_r\\AdvSimd.Arm64_Part2_r.cmd #65281
  • [Tests] System.Net.Security.Tests.LoggingTest.EventSource_EventsRaisedAsExpected Unhandled exception Unstable on Windows 11 #65279
    7.0.0
  • [Tests] System.Text.RegularExpressions System.InvalidProgramException : Common Language Runtime detected an invalid program #65278
    7.0.0

Closed

  • Test failure JIT\\Methodical\\NaN\\r4NaNadd_cs_r\\r4NaNadd_cs_r.cmd #65182
  • AddRemoveFromDifferentThreads<string>.ConcurrentStack benchmark hangs on ARM64 #64980
    7.0.0
  • Test failure Regressions/coreclr/GitHub_16833/Test16833/Test16833.sh #64178
    7.0.0
  • Test failure JIT/Methodical/explicit/coverage/expl_val_1_r/expl_val_1_r.sh #63604
    7.0.0
  • [MacCatalyst][x64] System.Reflection.Emit.Tests.ILGeneratorEmit4.TestDynamicMethodEmitCalliNonBlittable failed. #65304
  • Ability to #64543
  • [API Proposal]: _umul128 arm64 intrinsic support #64609
  • Consider using csFastFloat for faster FP parsing #48646
    Future
  • [API Proposal]: INumber<T> should not implement IUnaryNegationOperators<T, T> #65147
  • Disabling runtime marshaling broke DomainControllerTests.FindAll_NoSuchName_ReturnsEmpty() #65259
  • Test failure JIT\\HardwareIntrinsics\\Arm\\ArmBase\\ArmBase_ro\\ArmBase_ro.cmd #63856
    7.0.0
  • [wasm][aot][windows] Crash in `Microsoft.Extensions.HostFactoryResolver.Tests` with emsdk `2.0.34` #64724
    7.0.0
  • Error "The program can't start because api-ms-win-core-winrt-l1-1-0.dll is missing" after publishing .net 6 app on Windows 7 #55514
    7.0.0
  • Improve generated code by using for-loops when using exact quantifiers with backreferences in patterns. #65229
    7.0.0
  • System.Security.Cryptography.Pkcs.SignedCms failed at Decode as the Asn1Tag class is ContextSpecific instead of Universal #65163
  • Mention --roll-forward switch in error message when no matching frameworks are found #61019
  • Add diagnostic option to apphost itself. #63242
  • Application crash when calling a function in Linux #982
    Future
  • Explicit marshalling indication of return types doesn't work with delegates #34367
    Future
  • .NET Native compiler crashing #65052
  • Blazor WebAssembly error "IDBFS is not defined" #65298
  • Test failure readytorun/determinism/crossgen2determinism/crossgen2determinism.sh #65286
  • Test failure JIT/SIMD/VectorMatrix_ro/VectorMatrix_ro.sh #65285
  • Test failure JIT/Directed/nullabletypes/Desktop/boxunboxvaluetype_do/boxunboxvaluetype_do.sh #65284
  • Test failure JIT/Performance/CodeQuality/Roslyn/CscBench/CscBench.sh #65283
  • System.Text.Json.Serialization.Tests.StreamTests_Sync.HandleCollectionsAsync failing in Windows.Amd64.Server2022 #65053
  • .Skip allows a Collection to be modified during enumeration #40415
    7.0.0
  • Test failure JIT/Methodical/VT/port/lcs_gcref_do/lcs_gcref_do.sh #65287
  • Assertion failed '!"Write to unaliased local overlaps outstanding read"' during 'Rationalize IR' #64883
    7.0.0
  • Can not find tag 6.0.2(839cdfb) in main repo? #65117

PullRequests

Created

  • Separate capturing from normal states in NonBacktracking #65340
    area-System.Text.RegularExpressions
  • Add linux-musl entry for FALLBACK_HOST_RID #65339
    area-AssemblyLoader-coreclr, community-contribution
  • Make sure we have GCGenerationRanges events when using Generation-Aware analysis on Linux #65338
    area-GC-coreclr
  • Clean up a few confusing regex reduction tests #65334
    area-System.Text.RegularExpressions
  • Fix NonBacktracking hanging in System.Text.RegularExpressions.Tests.RegexMatchTests.StressTestDeepNestingOfLoops #65333
    area-System.Text.RegularExpressions
  • Fix stack overflow tests to accept 800703E9 exit code too #65331
    area-VM-coreclr
  • [release/6.0] Remove Unused Encoding on UriHelper #65330
    Servicing-consider, area-System.Net
  • [release/6.0] [mono] Fix r8->i conversion on amd64. #65329
    Servicing-consider, 6.0.x
  • [release/6.0] [mono][s390x] Fix OP_FCONV_TO_I and OP_RCONV_TO_I #65328
    Servicing-consider, area-Codegen-JIT-mono, 6.0.x
  • Resolve System.Net.Security.Tests.LoggingTest SkipTestException failure #65322
    area-System.Net.Security, 7.0.0
  • [mono][interp] Add checks for interpreter stack overflow. #65315
    area-Codegen-Interpreter-mono
  • Don't binplace Microsoft.XmlSerializer.Generator #65313
    area-Serialization
  • Explicitly check for TTL expiration when using Ping utility #65312
    area-System.Net
  • JIT: Consider local var reads to be outstanding only if they are values #65309
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • Generate 300 band Mono.Toolchain manifest #65308
    Servicing-consider, area-Infrastructure-libraries
  • [wasm] HTTP tests on NodeJS #65303
    arch-wasm, area-Infrastructure-mono, 7.0.0
  • Deduplicate some HWI codegen code #65302
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, community-contribution
  • Fix remaining COM warnings in crossgen2 #65297
    area-crossgen2-coreclr
  • Cleanup some XML tests #65290
    area-System.Xml
  • JIT: Unroll Equals and StartsWith for constant strings and spans. [0..32] chars #65288
    area-CodeGen-coreclr

Merged

  • Use global caching in JsonSerializerOptions #64646
    area-System.Text.Json, tenet-performance, 7.0.0
  • crossgen2: Report CORINFO_FLG_NOGCCHECK back for internal calls #65300
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • [interp] Use dynamic method's assembly when getting a native wrapper #65320
    area-Codegen-Interpreter-mono
  • Remove Unused Encoding on UriHelper #65326
    area-System.Net
  • Convert non-blittable delegate usage in System.DirectoryServices to function pointers. #65319
    area-System.DirectoryServices
  • [Group 3] Enable nullable annotations for `Microsoft.Extensions.FileProviders.Composite` #65223
    new-api-needs-documentation, area-Extensions-FileSystem, community-contribution
  • Disable multiple tests failing in R2R-CG2 legs #65227
  • [Mono] Add SIMD intrinsics for Vector{64, 128} on Arm64 Part I #64961
    area-Codegen-meta-mono, area-Codegen-LLVM-mono
  • [wasm] Add memalign to exported functions #65316
    arch-wasm, area-Build-mono, 7.0.0
  • [mono][s390x] Fix OP_FCONV_TO_I and OP_RCONV_TO_I #65185
    area-Codegen-JIT-mono
  • Improve regex code gen for non-backtracking repeaters #65240
    area-System.Text.RegularExpressions
  • [wasm] Allow overriding assertions level #65310
    area-Build-mono
  • [release/6.0] Fix long directory path test #64955
    area-System.IO
  • [release/6.0] Port ICU tests fix for server core x86 #65038
    area-System.Globalization
  • [release/5.0] Port ICU tests fix for server core x86 #65039
    area-System.Globalization
  • Fix runtime-official when executed against PRs in azdo #65034
    area-Infrastructure
  • Respect single target framework values in slngen.targets #65248
    area-Infrastructure-libraries
  • Remove {Try}HashData from AsymmetricAlgorithmHelpers #65277
    area-System.Security
  • Move more things under S.S.Cryptography. #65274
    area-System.Security
  • Remove not needed lines #65220
    area-Extensions-Configuration, community-contribution
  • [Group 5] Enable nullable annotations for `Microsoft.Extensions.Options.ConfigurationExtensions` #65208
    new-api-needs-documentation, area-Extensions-Configuration, community-contribution
  • [Group 3] Enable nullable annotations for `Microsoft.Extensions.Caching.Memory` #65213
    new-api-needs-documentation, area-Extensions-Caching
  • [release/6.0] Fix race condition in InteropSyncBlock for ComWrappers map. #65215
    Servicing-approved, Servicing-consider, area-Interop-coreclr, 6.0.3
  • [tests][mobile] Enable diagnostic_tracing for iOS runtime tests #64952
  • add test for lazy file system entries properties evaluation #65301
    area-System.IO, test enhancement, 7.0.0
  • [tests] Extend partial disablement of SkippingHiddenFiles #65280
    area-System.IO
  • Keep information about CSE defs on assignment nodes #64896
    area-CodeGen-coreclr

Updated

  • Improve regex optimizations around repetitions of the same character #65273
    area-System.Text.RegularExpressions, tenet-performance, 7.0.0
  • [tests][eventpipe] Port over Dotnet/Diagnostics to enable eventpipe tests on Android #64358
    area-Tracing-coreclr
  • For MultiRegStoreLoc prefer allocating a local def to the same register as src #64857
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • [wasm] Rationalize wasm jobs run on CI #65035
    NO REVIEW, area-Infrastructure-mono
  • Validate `IntPtr` and ByRef field overlap #65246
    area-TypeSystem-coreclr, 7.0.0
  • Add Maui performance scenarios to release6.0 runtime #65158
    Servicing-approved, area-Infrastructure-coreclr
  • [WIP] Heuristic change for double constant adjustment #65176
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • [wasm] bump sdk for workload testing to 7.0.100-preview.2.22108.4 #65003
    area-Infrastructure-libraries
  • [wasm] bump sdk for workload testing to 7.0.100-preview.1.22108.2 #65006
    area-Infrastructure-libraries
  • align GC memory load calculation on Linux with Docker and Kubernetes #64128
    area-PAL-coreclr, community-contribution
  • update SSL tests to deal better with disabled protocols #65120
    area-System.Net.Security, test enhancement
  • Avoid Attribute.GetCustomAttributes() returning null for open generic type #65237
    area-System.Reflection, community-contribution
  • Skip AOT of Microsoft.CodeAnalysis.CSharp.dll for WASM, due to out-of-memory issues in CI #63958
    arch-wasm, area-Infrastructure
  • Remove S.R.CS.Unsafe and Intrinsify Unsafe #64861
    area-System.Runtime.CompilerServices, new-api-needs-documentation, community-contribution
  • [WIP] Enable regions again. #64688
    * NO MERGE *, area-GC-coreclr
  • [LoongArch64] add the coreclr/pal directory #62887
    area-PAL-coreclr, community-contribution, arch-loongarch64, 7.0.0
  • [wasm] Use `--emit-symbol-map` to generate a `dotnet.js.symbols` #65162
    arch-wasm, area-Build-mono
  • [API Implementation]: Use TimeSpan everywhere we use an int for seconds, milliseconds, and timeouts (Group 1/3) #64860
    area-Meta, new-api-needs-documentation, community-contribution
  • Clean the OpenSSL error queue more consistently #65148
    area-System.Security
  • [IGNORE] debugging some crashes #65178
    NO REVIEW, arch-wasm, area-Build-mono
  • [Group 3] Enable nullable annotations for `Microsoft.Extensions.Logging` #65262
    new-api-needs-documentation, area-Extensions-Logging, community-contribution
  • Use StartsWith in regex compiler / source gen for shorter strings #65222
    area-System.Text.RegularExpressions, 7.0.0
  • [build] Move Mono API headers under src/native/public #64569
    area-Build-mono
  • [LoongArch64] JIT/EE interface for getting ABI-info #62893
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, community-contribution, arch-loongarch64, 7.0.0
  • [draft][wasm] JSImport/JSExport prototype #64493
    NO REVIEW, arch-wasm, new-api-needs-documentation, area-System.Runtime.InteropServices.JavaScript, 7.0.0
  • [mono][wasm] Link the aot profiler into dotnet.wasm by default in deb… #63262
    area-Build-mono
  • Allow constant propagation of Vector.Zero. #65028
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, 7.0.0
  • [LoongArch64] coreclr-vm directory #62885
    area-VM-coreclr, community-contribution, arch-loongarch64, 7.0.0
  • Remove the concept of fat dispatch tokens and fat type ids from 64 bit platforms #65045
    area-VM-coreclr
  • [API Implementation]: SafeFileHandle overloads for SetCreationTime, SetLastAccessTime, SetLastWriteTime #60507
    area-System.IO, community-contribution
  • Improve incremental build times of the libraries subset #64000
    area-Infrastructure-libraries, 7.0.0
  • [Mono] Add SIMD intrinsic for Vector64/128 comparisons #65128
    area-Codegen-JIT-mono
  • Change SslStream's internal adapter interface to use static abstract interface methods #65239
    area-System.Net.Security
  • [LoongArch64] coreclr-jit directory #62843
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, new-api-needs-documentation, community-contribution, arch-loongarch64, 7.0.0
  • [LoongArch64] add gc directory for LoongArch64. #63071
    area-GC-coreclr, community-contribution, arch-loongarch64, 7.0.0
  • [LoongArch64] Add LoongArch64 support in libunwind. #62979
    area-PAL-coreclr, community-contribution, arch-loongarch64, 7.0.0
  • [LoongArch64] coreclr/debug and part of inc directory. #62886
    area-Diagnostics-coreclr, community-contribution, arch-loongarch64, 7.0.0
  • [LoongArch64] add the `coreclr/unwinder/loongarch64` from the #62979. #63489
    area-VM-coreclr, community-contribution, arch-loongarch64, 7.0.0
  • Add RegexGenerator to System.ComponentModel.TypeConverter. #62325
    area-System.ComponentModel, community-contribution
  • Add support for Windows IO completions to the portable thread pool #64834
    area-System.Threading, 7.0.0
  • [wasm][debugger] Optional param fix 56251 #64970
    arch-wasm, area-Debugger-mono
  • [wasm][debugger] Fix exceptions on eval #64374
    arch-wasm, area-Debugger-mono
  • Ensure that InstructionSetFlags are correctly fixed up for unmatched VM #64158
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, 7.0.0
  • Do not reorder HTTP header values #65249
    area-System.Net.Http, community-contribution
  • disable GetGCMemoryInfo on FreeBSD #64937
    disabled-test, os-freebsd, area-PAL-coreclr
  • Structs: Do not mark "Hidden buffer pointer" as address-exposed #64130
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • [wasm][debugger] Support "on frame evaluation" of functions returning char #65135
    area-Debugger-mono
  • Process.Unix: reap all processes when running as pid 1. #65061
    area-System.Diagnostics.Process, community-contribution
  • Treat TZCNT/POPCNT/LZCNT as never negative #64951
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, 7.0.0
  • [release/6.0] update expected exception for cases when all requested TLS versions are disabled #65046
    area-System.Net
  • [JIT] More ARM64 comparison instruction optimizations with Vector.Zero #64783
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, 7.0.0
  • Move MacCatalyst to runtime-extra-platforms pipeline #64452
    area-Infrastructure-libraries
  • Add optimization "X & 1 == 1" to "X & 1" (#61412) #62818
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, community-contribution, 7.0.0
  • Remove ternary workaround for string.IsNullOrEmpty #63095
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, community-contribution, 7.0.0
  • Send CA names on Linux and OSX #65195
    area-System.Net.Security
  • Fixes for CFG dispatcher on ARM64 #65127
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • Use C# 10's enhanced struct initialization features #63131
    * NO MERGE *, area-System.Linq, community-contribution
  • Use SECPKG_ATTR_REMOTE_CERT_CHAIN to retrieve server cert during handshake #65134
    area-System.Net.Security
  • FileSystem: MoveDirectory: some improvements. #65132
    area-System.IO, community-contribution
  • [mono/win] Build native runtime as Debug again #60263
    area-Build-mono
  • [mono] Optimize and clean-up `System.Reflection.Emit.ILGenerator`. #65251
    area-System.Reflection-mono, community-contribution
  • Implement StringWriter composite formatting overloads. #65241
    area-System.IO, community-contribution

entry.title: dotnet/sdk - Issues & Pull Requests - 2022-02-14
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • Opening a SDK-style project in VS 2022 Preview fails with error about version mismatch of Microsoft.NET.Workload.Emscripten #23929

Closed

  • API Compat/Package Validation roadmap #18678
    7.0.1xx
  • The Microsoft.DotNet.Compatibility package is missing a package description #22320
    7.0.1xx

PullRequests

Created

  • Update source-build dependency to source-build-externals #23928
    Area-Infrastructure

Updated

  • Enable additional test projects to run on helix #23381
    Area-Infrastructure
  • Block loading the 7.0.100 SDK in 16.11 and below VS and MSBuild versions #23302
    Area-Infrastructure
  • Localized file check-in by OneLocBuild Task: Build definition ID 140: Build ID 1611014 #23858
    Area-Infrastructure

entry.title: dotnet/csharplang - Issues & Pull Requests - 2022-02-14
entry.content:
Issues

Updated

  • Champion: Simplified parameter null validation code #2145
    Working Set
  • Definite Assignment in Struct Constructors #5737
  • [Proposal] Forcing ConfigureAwait(false) on assembly level #2542

PullRequests

Updated

  • Update Language-Version-History.md #5440

entry.title: dotnet/roslyn - Issues & Pull Requests - 2022-02-14
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • C# LSP Regex completion does not work as expected. #59545
  • Disabling "Insert * at the start of new lines when writing /* */ comments" has no effect #59542
  • Move jobs to Ubuntu queue where possible #59539
  • Move "create VS insertion" job to Ubuntu queue #59538
  • `namedTySym.WithNullableAnnotation` isn't (apparently) working to remove annotations #59535
  • IDE help after typing `struct record Foo` #59534
  • nullchecking fixer should remove '_ = var ?? throw;' statements #59532
  • C# LSP does not auto-close XML elements in documentation comments #59530
  • List patterns: duplicate errors when no suitable indexers #59529

Closed

  • Peek Definition tries to show the generated .razor.g.cs file #58939
    17.2
  • Autocomplete list contains "and"/"or" in member access after tuple discard #46711
    Backlog
  • CSharpDeclareAsNullableCodeFixProvider threw "ArgumentException" on foreach declaration #46802
    Backlog
  • Error format string not filled for Error ENC0088 Modifying the body of '{0}' will prevent the debug session from continuing due to internal error: {1} #59418
    17.2
  • IDE0041 shows inaccurate title #47163
    Backlog
  • Possible NullReferenceException in AbstractConvertForToForEachCodeRefactoringProvider.cs #35320
    Backlog
  • IDE0044 (Make Field Readonly) Should not warn for DataMember fields in DataContract classes #40644
    Backlog

PullRequests

Created

  • Update source-build dependency to source-build-externals #59549
    Area-Infrastructure
  • Fix Generate-Equals for VB when invoked on type header. #59548
    Area-IDE
  • Use GetBestTypeByMetadataName in 'use System.HashCode' fixer #59547
    Area-IDE
  • Merge release/dev17.1-vs-deps to release/dev17.2 #59544
    Area-Infrastructure, auto-merge
  • Provide f1 help for discards #59543
    Area-IDE
  • Revert "Make solution options global" #59537
    Area-IDE
  • Initial sketch of exposing imports from the semantic model #59533
    Area-Compilers
  • Move LSP implementation from EditorFeatures to LanguageServer.Protocol #59531
    Area-IDE

Merged

  • Update Language Feature Status.md #59546
    Area-Compilers, Next
  • Move some nuget-search code to run in the BG #59540
    Area-IDE, Next
  • Catch more exceptions #59526
    Area-IDE, Next
  • Fix Peek Definition for Razor files #59528
    Area-IDE, Next
  • Bump Microsoft.DiaSymReader version for release #59536
    Area-Infrastructure
  • Update OneOffInsertion.ps1 path in 17.0 branch #59541
    Area-Infrastructure
  • Pass exception into internal error diagnostic #59443
    Area-Interactive, Next
  • Support extended property patterns in 'use recursive' refactoring #59490
    Area-IDE, Community, Next
  • Simplify the wrapping code for initializer-expression wrapping #59397
    Area-IDE, Feature Request, Next
  • Fixed IDE0044 (Make Field Readonly) for DataMember fields in DataContract classes #43489
    Area-IDE, Community, Next
  • Remove IBoundSwitchStatement #59516
    Area-Compilers, Community, Next
  • Make solution options global #59168
    Area-IDE, Next
  • Merge main to features/rename_ui_rework #59527
    Area-Infrastructure, auto-merge

Updated

  • Merge main to features/rename_ui_rework #59551
    Area-Infrastructure, auto-merge
  • Merge release/dev17.0-vs-deps to release/dev17.1 #59550
    Area-Infrastructure, auto-merge
  • Apply source-build patches #58727
    Area-Infrastructure
  • Address feedback from previous pattern matching ReadOnlySpan<char> change #59451
    Area-Compilers
  • Add external access APIs for O# #59469
    Area-IDE
  • Handle nullability attributes in param-nullchecking #59393
    Area-Compilers
  • [semi-auto-props]: Add more tests (GetMembers, speculative semantic model) #59270
    Area-Compilers, Community
  • Fix compile errors in test method code. #55613
    Area-Compilers
  • Semantic Snippets: Console snippet first look #59303
    Area-IDE
  • Value Tracking: Remove inproc symbol usage #59473
    Area-IDE
  • Render exception documentation texts. #56162
    Area-IDE
  • add all analyzers that are configured via editorconfig to code cleanup #59106
    Area-IDE
  • Update issue link for a workaround in source #59512
    Area-IDE, Community
  • Support parsing of checked user-defined operator declarations #59504
    Area-Compilers, New Feature - CheckedUserDefinedOperators
  • Support live diagnostics in source generated files #58363
    Area-IDE, UX Review Not Required
  • Fix nullable warning on conversion of anonymous function with implicit parameters #59522
    Area-Compilers
  • Add telemetry to log analyzer execution times during background analysis #59480
    Area-IDE, 17.2

entry.title: dotnet/aspnetcore - Issues & Pull Requests - 2022-02-14
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • Http.Sys response header serialization allocations #40215
  • Perf regression: fortunes_ef #40212
  • Blazor AOT publish failed on Microsoft.AspNetCore.Components.WebAssembly.dll #40209
  • SQL Connection hang issue with .Net 5 and Microsoft.Extensions.Caching.SqlServer 5.0.1 #40207
    7.0-preview3
  • [Razor] Review usage of cached data in TagHelperDescriptor #40206
    .NET 7 Planning
  • Host blazor webassembly app with different base path is not working as described in documentation #40205
    .NET 7 Planning
  • ResetPassword - move the decode of code to OnPost method #40203
  • Web API error response for malformed json using Text.Json is misleading and is exposing internals. #40202
  • Using StackExchange.Redis as a SignalR backplane - Issues when message to client exceeds a certain size #40200
  • In JS interop, handle ValueTask equivalently as Task #40198
    Backlog
  • OpenAPI C# client generator generates wrong request media type for corresponding deserializer when multiple response content possible. #40197
  • [.Net 6.0.102] dotnet pack - Microsoft.NET.Sdk.Razor.StaticWebAssets.targets NotFoundException #40196
  • [Blazor] More information required on closed ticket #40195
  • IIS does not recover from a broken web.config in v6 hosting bundle where it used to in v3 and v5 #40194
  • Perf regression: json_netty #40193
  • Perf improvement: fortunes_nodejs, json_actix #40192
  • [Docs] More detail for `Microsoft.AspNetCore.Http.ConnectionInfo.RemoteIpAddress` #40191
    .NET 7 Planning
  • Blazor NavigationManager.NavigateTo always scrolls page to the top. #40190
    Backlog

Closed

  • IIS is stuck while restarting local server #25163
    .NET 7 Planning
  • Can we talk about constructor injection now that partial classes are here? #18088
    7.0-preview2
  • Is there something like IIS recycling periodically for Kestrel server on Linux? #40147
  • InputRadioGroup does not support state preservation for child content #31610

entry.title: dotnet/maui - Issues & Pull Requests - 2022-02-14
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • Cannot change Android package bundle #4660

Closed

entry.title: dotnet/efcore - Issues & Pull Requests - 2022-02-14
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • Stop wrapping single changes in transactions #27439
  • Don't warn for decimal mappings in keyless entity types #27438
  • Remove MakeGenericMethod from the query hot path #27437
  • Breaking: failing tests for updating many-to-many relationship after update to v6.0.2 #27436

Closed

  • InterceptSql - An easy way to change the entire EF Core generated query #27435
  • Union issue with only one join query #27424
  • ASP.Net core x86 application #27414
  • Suggestion about IAsyncQueryProvider namespace #27401
  • Slow First Query after project startup #27392
  • Getting the Id for the next insert #27387
  • Add Entity Framework to the project from local disk #27381
  • Slow DB performance with SQLite using EF Core in UWP app #27365
